|      |                                      |               |               | Here are some additional steps you need to follow to set up OAuth2 on top of your existing setup using the `passport` and `passport-oauth2` npm packages. I'll show you a generic setup for an OAuth2 strategy, but remember that the specific configuration details depend on your OAuth2 provider.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **Step 1: Install passport and passport-oauth2**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Passport is Express-compatible authentication middleware for Node.js, and passport-oauth2 is a Passport strategy for OAuth 2.0. Install them with this command:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```bash                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | npm install passport passport-oauth2                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **Step 2: Import the required modules**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Add the following lines at the top of your `app.js` file:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```javascript                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | const passport = require('passport');                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | const OAuth2Strategy = require('passport-oauth2');                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **Step 3: Configure passport**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Next, add these lines to your `app.js` file to configure Passport:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```javascript                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | app.use(passport.initialize());                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | passport.serializeUser((user, done) => {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   done(null, user);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | passport.deserializeUser((user, done) => {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   done(null, user);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **Step 4: Set up the OAuth2 strategy**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Now you can set up the OAuth2 strategy. Replace `'clientID'`, `'clientSecret'`, `'authorizationURL'`, and `'tokenURL'` with the details from your OAuth2 provider. Also replace `'callbackURL'` with the URL where your provider should redirect after authorization:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```javascript                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | passport.use(new OAuth2Strategy({                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     clientID: 'clientID',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     clientSecret: 'clientSecret',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     callbackURL: 'http://localhost:3000/auth/callback',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     authorizationURL: 'authorizationURL',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     tokenURL: 'tokenURL'                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   },                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   function(accessToken, refreshToken, profile, done) {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     done(null, profile);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ));                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **Step 5: Define the authentication routes**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Next, you need to define the routes that initiate the authentication process and handle the authentication callback:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```javascript                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | app.get('/auth', passport.authenticate('oauth2'));                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | app.get('/auth/callback',                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   passport.authenticate('oauth2', { failureRedirect: '/login' }),                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   function(req, res) {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     res.redirect('/api/data');                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **Step 6: Secure your API route**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Finally, secure your API route by ensuring that a user is authenticated before accessing it:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```javascript                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | app.get('/api/data', ensureAuthenticated, (req, res) => {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   const request = new sql.Request();                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   const query = 'SELECT * FROM table_name';                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   request.query(query, (err, recordset) => {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     if (err) console.error(err);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     res.send(recordset);                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |   });                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |

Root Folder                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - Common: This is a globally accessible folder where shared resources (like scripts, common data models, etc.) can be stored. The HQ and all regional teams can access this folder.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - HQ: Exclusive folder for the headquarter team.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |      - HQ_Dev: Development workspace for the HQ team.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |      - HQ_Test: A testing environment for the HQ team.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |      - HQ_Prod: The production environment where finalized apps/dashboards are placed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - Region1, Region2, ..., Region6: These folders are assigned to the respective regional teams and each one has a similar structure:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |      - RegionX_Dev: Each region's development workspace. Only the team from that region and the HQ team have access.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |      - RegionX_Test: A testing environment for each region's team.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |      - RegionX_Prod: The production environment for each region, where finalized apps/dashboards are placed.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 2. **Create a new ASP.NET Core Web API project**:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    You can create a new project via .NET CLI command:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
