|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 3. **Install the necessary NuGet packages**: For connecting to SQL Server, you will need Entity Framework Core. Install it via .NET CLI:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    dotnet add package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    dotnet add package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 4. **Create a Model**: This will represent the table you're connecting to in SQL Server. For example:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```csharp                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    public class User                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        public int Id { get; set; }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        public string Name { get; set; }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        // More properties as needed                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 5. **Create a DbContext**: This is a class provided by Entity Framework Core that manages database connections.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```csharp                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    public class MyApiContext : DbContext                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        public MyApiContext(DbContextOptions<MyApiContext> options)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |            : base(options)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |        public DbSet<User> Users { get; set; }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 6. **Configure Connection String**: In your `Startup.cs` file, configure the DbContext with your connection string in the `ConfigureServices` method:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    ```csharp                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    services.AddDbContext<MyApiContext>(options =>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    And add your connection string in `appsettings.json`:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | - Install .NET Core SDK.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - Install Visual Studio or another C# IDE.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **2. Create a new .NET Core Web API project:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **3. Connect your API to SQL Server:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```json                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |     },                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **4. Install Entity Framework Core:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - Entity Framework is an ORM that allows you to interact with your database using C# objects.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - Install it using the NuGet package manager in Visual Studio or by running the following command in your project directory:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```shell                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | dotnet add package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **5. Create a Model:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - This is a C# class that maps to your SQL Server table.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - Each property in the class corresponds to a column in the table.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **6. Create a DbContext:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - DbContext is a class provided by Entity Framework that manages the database connections and transactions.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - In your DbContext class, define a DbSet property for each of your models.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **7. Register DbContext with Dependency Injection:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - In the `ConfigureServices` method of your `Startup.cs` file, register your DbContext with the connection string.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```csharp                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     services.AddDbContext<YourDbContext>(options =>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |         options.UseSqlServer(Configuration.GetConnectionString("DefaultConnection")));                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |     ...                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **8. Create a Controller:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - This is where you'll define your API endpoints.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - For each operation that you want to expose (like GET, POST, DELETE, etc.), create an action in your controller.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - Use the DbContext to interact with your database.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | **9. Run and Test your API:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - Run your API from your IDE or by using the command `dotnet run` in your project directory.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | - You can now access your API endpoints through the browser or a tool like Postman.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Remember, this is just a high-level overview. Depending on your specific needs, there may be more details to consider such as handling complex queries, implementing authorization and authentication, managing error responses, and others. Also, be sure to secure any sensitive data, such as passwords and connection strings, especially when your application is in production.                                                                                                                                                |                       |                                      |
