|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Here is an example:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```markdown                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | <!--                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | This block of text will be hidden in the rendered Markdown preview in VS Code,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | but it will be visible in the source code of the Markdown file.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | -->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | ```                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | When you preview this Markdown file in VS Code (or any other Markdown viewer that respects HTML syntax), the text within the HTML comment tags will not be visible.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Please note, while this effectively "hides" the content from the rendered view, the content is still there in the source, and can be seen by anyone who can access the source file. This is not a method for securing sensitive information. It's more a way to include notes or reminders to yourself or to others who may be editing the Markdown file in the future.                                                                                                                                                              |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | If you are looking for a way to create collapsible or expandable sections in the rendered Markdown preview in VS Code, as of my last update in September 2021, this feature is not natively supported in the standard Markdown or VS Code's Markdown preview.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | Some Markdown flavors or extensions may support this feature. If you are creating documents for a specific platform (like GitHub, GitLab, or a particular static site generator), you should check the documentation for that platform to see what extended Markdown features it supports.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               | 1. **Check the Microsoft Power BI Gateway service**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |

The Services app should appear.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - In the Services app, look for the 'On-premises data gateway service'. If it's not running, right-click and start the service.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - If it is already running, try restarting the service.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               | 2. **Check the gateway account**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - The account you use to log in to the gateway should be the same as the one you use for Power BI. Double-check your credentials and try logging in again.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - If you're using a service account, make sure the account has the necessary permissions and rights. If needed, switch to a different account.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |

|      |                                      |               |               |    - Sometimes, firewall or network settings can prevent the gateway from connecting to Power BI. Make sure ports 443 (outbound) and 5671-5672 (outbound) are open.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |    - If your company has a proxy server, you might need to configure the gateway to use the proxy. Check with your IT department if you're not sure.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |

Remember to backup your settings first.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                       |                                      |
|      |                                      |               |               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |                       |                                      |
